S08n719:682: karmakrodhā sukarmāṇi kuryād rakṣāṃ tu rakṣayā |
S08n719:683: krodhayakṣā ripuṃ khādet krodhamuṣṭistu siddhidā || iti ||11 ||
S08n719:700: dharmamudrāstu tā eva huṃkāraiḥ sahitāḥ punaḥ ||8 ||
S08n719:707: dhik khīḥ hūṃ graṃ, kṛ vaṃ dṛ aḥ |
S08n719:713: tatra tatra tu vai veṣṭya tāṃ tāṃ mudrāṃ prayojayet ||2 ||
S08n719:731: yasya vai rātvakāyaṃ tu samāviṣṭastu tāḍayet ||8 ||
S08n719:732: vajramudrādvikaṃ badhvā kavacaṃ svaṃ parasya vā |
S08n719:733: granthanan tarjanībhyāṃ tu rakṣā bhavatī śāśvatī ||9 ||
S08n719:757: vajrāgryābhyāṃ svakukṣau tu kuśaṃstu hṛdayaṃ hṛdi ||21 ||
S08n719:768: sūtraṃ tu dhārayetpaścāt yathāvat sūtraṇaṃ smṛtaṃ ||1 ||
